name: Traditional Balinese Massage
description: Experience the ultimate relaxation with a traditional Balinese massage that combines gentle stretches, acupressure, aromatherapy and reflexology to stimulate the flow of blood, oxygen and energy around your body.

name: Bali Sunrise Trekking
description: Embark on a guided trek up Mount Batur in time to witness a spectacular sunrise over the volcanic landscape and Lake Batur below.

name: Santorini Catamaran Sunset Cruise
description: Sail around the caldera on a catamaran, stopping at hot springs, snorkeling spots, and enjoying a BBQ dinner on board while watching the famous Santorini sunset.

name: Santorini Wine Tasting Tour
description: Visit three traditional wineries and sample up to 12 different wine varieties produced from grapes grown in Santorini's volcanic soil, known for its distinctive minerality.

name: Kyoto Tea Ceremony Experience
description: Participate in a traditional Japanese tea ceremony in an authentic tea house, learning about the history and cultural significance of this centuries-old practice.

name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove & Monkey Park Tour
description: Explore the stunning bamboo forest and visit the Iwatayama Monkey Park where you can observe Japanese macaques in their natural habitat.

name: Paris Museum Pass
description: Get priority access to over 50 museums and monuments in Paris, including the Louvre, Orsay Museum, and Arc de Triomphe.

name: Seine River Dinner Cruise
description: Enjoy a gourmet dinner while cruising along the Seine River, taking in the illuminated landmarks of Paris by night.

name: Cancun Underwater Museum Snorkeling Tour
description: Snorkel among hundreds of life-size sculptures at the MUSA underwater museum, an incredible artificial reef teeming with marine life.

name: Chichen Itza Day Trip from Cancun
description: Visit one of the New Seven Wonders of the World on this guided tour of the ancient Mayan city, including a cenote swim and lunch.

name: Machu Picchu Guided Tour
description: Explore the ancient Incan citadel with a knowledgeable guide who will share insights about its history, construction, and astronomical significance.

name: Sacred Valley and Machu Picchu 2-Day Tour
description: Comprehensive tour of the Sacred Valley's ancient sites, including overnight accommodation and a full guided tour of Machu Picchu.
